committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Lands, Reserved Water and Resource Conservation
Subcommittee on Public Lands and National Parks

official_title: A bill to amend the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act by designating a segment of the Illinois River in Oregon and the Owyhee River in Oregon as components of the National Wild and Scenic River System, and for other purposes.

summary.text: (Measure passed House, amended) Amends the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act to designate a segment of the Illinois River and three segments of the Owyhee River, both in Oregon, as components of the National Wild and Scenic Rivers System. Provides for a study of a segment of the North Umpqua River, in Oregon, to determine whether or not it should be designated as a part of the wild and scenic rivers system. Directs the Secretary of Agriculture to provide that management practices for Steamboat Creek (a tributary to the North Umpqua River) conserve, protect, and enhance its anadromous fish habitat and population.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act by designating a segment of the Illinois River in Oregon and the Owyhee River in Oregon as components of the National Wild and Scenic River System, and for other purposes.
